title: May i know what i was reported for so i can change my behavior accordinally?
body: I received a message saying i have been given a warning for bad sportsmanship, but i dont believe ive done anything wrong. the past games ive been doing really good on and haven't been toxic to my knowledge. can i plz get some clarification on the reason i have been given a warning so i can avoid it in the future?

replies.body:
Hey AnimeAmbush! We don't have access to your logs here on the Boards, so we aren't the best place to ask if you're looking for clarification regarding your warning. Your best bet is to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support, and they'll hopefully be able to help you identify points where you need to improve upon. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Let me know if you have any other questions!
